member.name: T:MyServiceLibrary.ILogger
member.summary: This interface defines basic methods for logging messages.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.ILogger.WriteInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Designates informational messages that highlight the progress of the application at coarse-grained level.
member.param: Text of message.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.ILogger.WriteDebug(System.String)
member.summary: Designates fine-grained informational events that are most useful to debug an application.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.ILogger.WriteWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Designates potentially harmful situations.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.ILogger.WriteError(System.String)
member.summary: Designates very severe error events that will presumably lead the application to abort.

member.name: T:MyServiceLibrary.InvalidUserException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown if the client would attempt to create an incorrect user.

member.name: T:MyServiceLibrary.InvalidVisaRecordException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown if the client would attempt to create an incorrect visa record.

member.name: T:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage
member.summary: This interface prodives basic operations for storage such as CRUD and seeking operations.

member.name: P:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.Count
member.summary: This property returns the number of users in a storage.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.Add(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method ads the given user to the storage if it doesn't exist.
member.param: A user which must be added to the storage.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.Delete(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method removes the given user from the storage if it exists.
member.param: A user which must be removed.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method removes a user from the storage by using user's id.
member.param: An Id of the user which must be removed.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.Contains(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method defines if the given user exist into the storage.
member.returns: Returns true if the given user exists.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.GetUserByPredicate(System.Func{MyServiceLibrary.User,System.Boolean})
member.summary: This method finds a user by the given criteria.
member.param: Represents the method for searching a specific user by given criterion.
member.returns: Returns user which was found by using the criteria function.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorage.GetUsersByPredicate(System.Func{MyServiceLibrary.User,System.Boolean})
member.summary: This method finds a collection of users by the given criteria.
member.param: Represents the method for searching users by given criteria.
member.returns: Returns a collection of users which was found by using the criteria function.

member.name: T:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorageService
member.summary: This interface provides an API of CRUD and seeking operations for storage of users.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorageService.Add(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method ads users to the storage if this storage doesn't contain the user.
member.param: User which must be added.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorageService.Delete(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method removes user from the storage.
member.param: A user that must be removed.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorageService.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: This method removes user from the storage if it exists.
member.param: Id of the user which must be deleted.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorageService.GetUserByPredicate(System.Func{MyServiceLibrary.User,System.Boolean})
member.summary: This method finds a user by the given criteria.
member.param: Represents the method for searching a specific user by given criterion.
member.returns: Returns user which was found by using the criteria function.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.IUserStorageService.GetUsersByPredicate(System.Func{MyServiceLibrary.User,System.Boolean})
member.summary: This method finds an array of users by the given predicate.
member.param: Represents the method for searching users by given criterion.
member.returns: Returns a collection of users which was found by using the criteria function.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.User.Equals(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method determines if the current user is equals to another one.
member.param: Another user.
member.returns: Returns true if they are equal.

member.name: M:MyServiceLibrary.User.CompareTo(MyServiceLibrary.User)
member.summary: This method compares the current user to another one.
member.param: Another user.
member.returns: Returns 0 if users are equal. Returns -1 if the current user is less than another. Returns 1 if the current user is greater than given another.

member.summary: This method returns string representation of the current user.
member.returns: String that represent the current user.
